custom_field.description: By checking this box you confirm no one booked on the tour has a history of serious medical conditions. Including, but not limited to, anyone who is pregnant, has  back or neck problems, osteoporosis or recent surgery.

custom_field.description: **By checking this box you understand and agree to our Cancellation Policy.** *Customers will receive a full refund or credit with 24 hours notice of cancellation. Customers will also receive a full refund or credit in case of operator cancellation due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. Contact us by phone to cancel or inquire about a cancellation. No-shows will be charged the full price.*
